overview: Frenchman Abel Tiffauges is a naive man who lives a simple life working as a mechanic. Falsely accused of being a child abuser, he is recruited as a soldier when World War II begins, but is captured soon and taken to the heart of Nazi Germany.
cast: John Malkovich|Armin Mueller-Stahl|Gottfried John|Marianne Sägebrecht|Volker Spengler
